result.arabic_text: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطٗا
result.translation: and that the fool among us [i.e., Satan] used to say outrageous things about Allah[2],
result.footnotes: [2] i.e., Satan tempted humans to believe that Allah has a wife and children, and that the angels are Allah's daughters.
